functions.tag: {CustomModelData:5,Wearable:true,display:{Name:'{"translate":"赤いリボン","color":"#AC43FF","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"特殊装備枠。","color":"#CCCCCC","italic":false}','{"translate":"右クリックで頭に装備可能。","color":"#CCCCCC","italic":false}','{"translate":"身に着けたものを可愛く見せる布。","color":"#FFBBFD","italic":false}','{"translate":"だがしかし何事にも例外はある。","color":"#C68CC4","italic":false}']},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"カスタム",Amount:10.5d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;21,0,0,10],Slot:"head"},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.49d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;21,0,0,21],Slot:"head"},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.07d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;21,0,0,31],Slot:"head"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-28d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;21,0,0,40],Slot:"head"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.35d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;21,0,0,51],Slot:"head"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.35d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;21,0,0,61],Slot:"head"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.42d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;21,0,0,71],Slot:"head"}]}
